greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse of coordination sequence array A113413.
comment: Formal inverse of A035607 when written as lower triangular matrix 1 2 1 2 4 1 ...
formula: Essentially the same as the triangle T(n, k), for n>0 and k>0, given by [0, -2, -1, -2, -1, -2, -1, -2, ...] DELTA A000007. Triangle (unsigned) given by [0, 2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 2, ...] DELTA A000007, where DELTA is Deléham's operator defined in A084938.
xref: Row sums are signed little Schroeder numbers A080243. Diagonal sums are given by A080244.
Essentially same triangle as A033877 but with rows read in reversed order.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Feb 13 2003
